name: Project Step Up
description:
This is a game about to robots that got created in an experiment. Each robot generates a different kind of energy - the blue energy makes you lighter and the red energy makes you heavier. To survive the robots need to share some energy of the other and that is how they are linked together. The robots are trying to escape the lab in which they were created.

Made by Marian Dziubiak and Youness Kafia.

https://github.com/manio143/project-step-up
